0.1.name: wordpress/simple-daily-quotes
0.1.description: Displays great inspirational hand picked quotes in your blog's sidebar, daily or randomly. Your visitors can tweet quote with single click. You can choose which quotes to display which day, you can edit and add your own quotes. There more than 250 unique quotes. To install, click activate and then go to Appearance > Widgets to find 'Simple Daily Quotes'. All settings are contained within the widget. Visit plugin homepage for help about editing/adding quotes.
